markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Fearweed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=828)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 66</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Cultivated by mashing and fermenting toxic weeds found in lonely graveyards, _fearweed_ is a greenish paste magically infused with psychic horror. The [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition from _fearweed_ can't be removed while the poison lasts.

 **Saving Throw** DC 30 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 7d6 poison damage and frightened 1 (1 minute); **Stage 2** 8d6 poison damage and frightened 2 (1 minute); **Stage 3** 9d6 poison damage and frightened 3 (1 minute)

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of 4th-level [fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fearweed
